pages.title: Formulation Vat
pages.text: The <item>Formulation Vat/$ is a machine for producing several liquids used in bulk. It requires a liquid input and an item ingredient, which are used to make the liquid output.$(br2)It uses <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)heat/$, and runs faster the closer it is to 100°C. If the temperature exceeds 100°C

at all, it totally stops working but still consumes heat, so ideally it should be kept at just slightly below 100°C.$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)Circuits/$ measure the fullness of the item input, as a value from 0 to 15.$(br2)
